home.title: Let's have an organized life.
home.description: Let our to-do app make your life easier.

dialogs.taskConfirmation: Are you sure to create new task?
dialogs.taskCancelation:
Are you sure to cancel creating new task?
This will empty task form!

deleteTask.body: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

leaveTask.body: Are you sure you want to leave this task?

acceptDialog.body: Are you sure you want to accept the invitation and join in the task?

declineDialog.body:
Are you sure you want to decline the invitation?
Note: you will not be able to change this decision unless you receive another invitation

sendfriendshipRequestDialog.body: Are you sure you want to send friendship request to <0>{{userFullName}}</0>?

accept.body: Are you sure you want to add <0>{{userFullName}}</0> to your friends list?

reject.body: Are you sure you want to reject <0>{{userFullName}}</0>'s friendship request?

unfriend.body: Are you sure you want to delete <0>{{userFullName}}</0> from your friends list?
